name.baseName: Large-scale pig production ; 5W JTS pig farm
规模生猪生产 ; 5W JTS 猪场

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: An important feature of the difference between large-scale intensive pig farming and traditional pig farming is that the production process realizes the flow type of balanced production, and the product mass and standardization. Due to different pig house types, different management measures, different feed sources and formulation technologies, and different methods of manure treatment, the environmental impact caused by the whole and key nodes of the pig production system of different scales has not been accurately understood. This chapter has systematically studied the pig production system model established in Chapter 2.
规模集约化养猪与传统养猪相区别的一个重要特征是生产过程中实现流水式均 衡生产，产品批量化、规格化。由于不同猪舍类型、不同的管理措施、不同的饲料 来源及配方技术、粪污处理采取不同方法等，不同规模生猪生产系统整体及关键节 点导致的环境影响并没有确切认识，本章结合第二章构建的生猪生产系统模型进行 系统地研究。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The application coefficient (100/ field weight) was corrected to the standard functional unit weight of 100kg due to inconsistent field weight.

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: According to the 2012 "China Animal Husbandry Yearbook", the pig breeding mode can be divided into retail breeding of 1 to 49 pigs per year; Small scale breeding of 50 to 499 pigs per year; Medium scale breeding of 500 to 9999 pigs per year; There are four types of large-scale breeding of more than 10,000 pigs annually.
按照 2012 年《中国畜牧业年鉴》的划分，生猪养殖模式可分为年出栏生猪 1 头至 49 头的散户 养殖；年出栏生猪 50 头至 499 头的小规模养殖；年出栏生猪 500 头至 9999 头的中 规模养殖；年出栏生猪 10000 头以上的大规模养殖四种模式。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The characteristics of intensive pig breeding in Hubei Province are summarized through field investigation, that is, the pig production technology is mostly self-propagation and self-rearing, and the feeding mode of all in and all out is phased. There are various types of pig houses. Generally, mechanical ventilation is used in the pig house to prevent heat and cool down and keep warm and control the small environment in the house. Sows and piglets are raised in limited stalls and high beds, the average renewal rate is generally 35%-40%, and the service life of breeding pigs is 3-4 years. The diet is formulated into a full-priced feed according to the nutritional needs of the physiological stage, mainly corn and other grains, and feed raw materials are purchased from outside. Most of the breeds are foreign three-way cross-bred pigs (such as DLY), and more than 10,000 commercial pigs are put out annually. In daily management, dry cleaning and blistering feces are adopted to facilitate the separation of dry and wet. Manure treatment method uses dry manure compost, sewage anaerobic fermentation process to produce biogas. The 10,000 pig farm is one point distribution, more than 50,000 intensive pig farms take multi-point layout, breeding farm + fattening farm, weaning piglets use truck transport turnover.

通过实地调研归纳了湖北省集约化生猪养殖的特点，即生猪生产工艺多为自繁 自养采用全进全出分阶段饲养方式。建有各种类型猪舍。一般猪舍内采用机械通风， 进行防暑降温驱寒保暖及舍内小环境控制；母猪与仔猪采用限位栏和高床饲养，平 均更新率一般在 35%-40%，种猪使用年限在 3-4 年。日粮依据生理阶段的营养需要 配制成全价饲料，以玉米等谷物为主，饲料原料从外部购买。品种多数为洋三元杂 交猪（如 DLY），年出栏商品猪 10000 头以上；日常管理中采用干清粪、水泡粪方 式，以利干湿分离；粪污处理方式采用干粪堆肥，污水进行厌氧发酵工艺生产沼气。 万头猪场为一点分布，五万头以上集约化猪场采取多点布局，繁育场+育肥场，断奶 仔猪使用卡车运输周转。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The research object of commercial pig LCA established in this paper is commercial pig product system, so the objectives of commercial pig LCA should include the following aspects: 1) According to the production process of commercial pig, clarify the environmental impact types of key links or processes in the production process of commercial pig; 2) According to the characteristics of different production systems of commercial pigs, clarify the environmental impact scores of different production systems, and evaluate the environmental friendliness of different product systems through impact scores; 3) According to the environmental impact assessment results of the live pig production system, the improvement or optimization ways and suggestions are proposed.
本文确立的商品猪 LCA 的研究对象是商品猪产品系统，因此商品猪 LCA 的目 标应包含以下几个方面：1）依照商品猪的生产流程，阐明商品猪生产工艺中的关键 环节或过程的环境影响类型；2）依据商品猪的不同生产系统特点阐明不同生产系统 的环境影响评分，并通过影响评分评价不同产品系统的环境友好程度；3）依据对生 猪生产系统的环境影响评价结果提出改善或优化途径以及建议。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The data set describes the large-scale intensive pig farming operations at a 5W JTS pig farm, identifying it as an agricultural process optimized for high-volume pig production. This production model encompasses the use of advanced techniques for balanced flow production as well as standardized breeding and feeding practices suitable for both the breeding and fattening of over 10,000 pigs annually. The farm utilizes self-breeding, self-rearing, and phased all-in-all-out feeding strategies with various pig house types designed for environmental control. The breeds mainly involve foreign three-way cross-bred pigs, and manure is processed through dry composting and anaerobic fermentation for biogas production.
此数据集描述了 5W JTS猪场的大规模集约化养猪作业，是农业过程的一部分，专为高容量猪生产进行优化。这一生产模式涵盖了均衡流水式生产以及规格化繁殖和喂养实践的使用，适用于每年超过 10,000 头猪的繁殖与育肥。该农场采用自繁自养、分阶段全进全出喂养策略，并配备了适用于环境控制的各种类型猪舍。主要饲养的品种包括外国三元杂交猪，粪便通过干堆肥和厌氧发酵用于生产沼气。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: According to the continuity, functionality, relative independence of production process, main characteristics of pig production stage and 相应物 quality input type, it can be divided into five key stages: building materials input, piglet production, feed consumption, daily management and waste treatment. Weaned piglets are used as carriers to share the corresponding environmental impacts of the inputs and outputs of sows in piglet production. The feed consumption link includes land demand, crop planting, fertilizer, pesticides and agricultural machinery input. Daily management includes water and electricity input and emissions of ammonia, methane, nitrous oxide and carbon dioxide in the house. Manure treatment includes dry manure composting and anaerobic fermentation of sewage.

依据生产工艺连续性、功能性、相对独立性及生猪生产阶段主要特点及相应物 质输入类型划分为建材投入、仔猪生产、饲料消耗、日常管理、粪污处理五个重点 环节，同时依据生命周期思想，把仔猪生产环节中饲养母猪的输入与输出物质以断 奶仔猪作为载体分担相应的环境影响，饲料消耗环节包括土地需求、作物种植、化 肥、农药与农用机械投入。日常管理环节包含水电投入及舍内氨气、甲烷、氧化亚 氮、二氧化碳排放。粪污处理包括干粪堆肥与污水厌氧发酵过程。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Field measurement and collection of pig farm original record data, field measurement refers to the determination of the number of pig houses, types, specifications, building materials, etc. Collect monthly report data of pig farm, including pig stock structure, sow breeding performance, live pig growth performance, live pig sales, feed import and export list, feed category, anisol formula of feed at different stages, and original records of water and electricity consumption of pig farm. The concentration of harmful gases in the air of the pig house, the discharge of manure were consulted in the literature, the feed transportation, crop planting methods, and the use of agricultural materials were consulted in the national and Hubei provincial statistical yearbook. The purpose of collecting these records is to determine the energy resources of pigs at different stages and the corresponding emission data. Some of the data were obtained by referring to literature, such as the statistical yearbook of the National Bureau of Statistics, the yearbook of the Hubei Provincial Bureau of Statistics, and other relevant research data of scholars. 62 pig farms were investigated on site, and 30 large-scale pig farms were selected for modeling.

采取实地测量及收集猪 场原始记录数据，实地测量是指测定猪舍栋数，类型，规格，建材类别等。收集猪 场月报表数据，含猪群存栏结构、母猪繁殖性能、生猪生长性能、生猪销售、饲料 进出清单，饲料类别，不同阶段饲料的大料配方、猪场水电消耗原始记录资料。猪 舍空气中有害气体浓度，粪污排量查阅文献，饲料运输、作物种植方式、农资使用 量等查阅国家和湖北省统计年鉴。收集这些记录资料目的是确定不同阶段猪只的能 源资源及相应的排放数据。部分数据通过查阅文献资料获得，如国家统计局的统计 年鉴，湖北省统计局的年鉴资料，其他学者相关的研究数据。现场调研了 62 个猪场， 精选 30 个规模猪场数据进行建模。
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: The gas production coefficients used in this paper were NH3:8.2g/D.ig, CO2:2.6kg/ d.ig, N2O: 0.48g/ D.ig, CH4:3.5g/ D.ig at sow stage. Finishing stage NH3:6.9g/D.IGCO2:1585g/ d.IGN2O
本文采用的气体产生系数为母猪阶段 NH3：8.2g/d.pig，CO2：2.6kg/d.pig，N2O： 0.48g/d.pig，CH4：3.5g/d.pig；育肥阶段 NH3：6.9 g/d.pigCO2：1585g/d.pigN2O 83 0.34g/d.pig，CH4：5.5g/d.pig。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 惠晓红. 运用生命周期评价与生态效率法评估湖北省生猪养殖系统研究. (华中农业大学, 2017).
惠晓红. 运用生命周期评价与生态效率法评估湖北省生猪养殖系统研究. (华中农业大学, 2017).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This data set should be used to understand the environmental impact of large-scale pig farming operations. Users should consider the technical variations in pig house design, feeding strategies, and manure processing methods when interpreting the data. The life cycle assessment model must account for material input divisions across stages like building materials, piglet production, feed consumption, and manure treatment processes. Additionally, assessments should include considerations for emissions from daily management practices such as power usage and facility emissions. Special attention should be paid to the application coefficients for standardizing outputs to a functional weight unit, and datasets from other sources, such as national and provincial yearbooks or field survey results, are necessary for a comprehensive understanding.
此数据集应用于理解大规模养猪操作的环境影响。用户应当在解释数据时考量猪舍设计、喂养策略和粪便处理方法的技术变化。生命周期评估模型必须考虑跨建筑材料、仔猪生产、饲料消耗和粪便处理等阶段的材料投入划分。评估还应包括对日常管理实践引起的功耗和设施排放的考虑。需要特别注意的是，标准化输出到功能重量单位的应用系数，以及来自国家和省级年鉴或现场调查结果等其他来源的数据集对于全面理解至关重要。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

Due to the inconsistency in the slaughter weight, the coefficient (100/the slaughter weight) is used to correct the standard functional unit weight of 100kg.
由于出栏体重不一致运用系数（100/出栏体重）校正为 100kg 的标准功能单元体重。
